# defaultSource

**Instance Property**

The previous blend stage value.

## Declaration

```swift
var defaultSource: Self.ValueType? { get }
```

## Discussion

The default source is the value output from the previous blend stage, and initialized with [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationStateProtocol/defaultTarget] for the first stage.
title: defaultSource
